trans-unit.target: 比同等的正则表达式快10倍

trans-unit.source: Copyright © 2019 Ben Simms and Ben Mintz
trans-unit.target: 版权所有©2019 Ben Simms和Ben Mintz

trans-unit.source: None of the existing python libraries fit my needs.
trans-unit.target: 现有的python库都不符合我的需求。

trans-unit.source: Operates on Unicode word bounds, rather than naïve substring matching
trans-unit.target: 在Unicode字边界上操作，而不是单纯的子字符串匹配

trans-unit.source: Supports arbitrary values associated with each keyword
trans-unit.target: 支持与每个关键字相关联的任意值

trans-unit.source: This library is AGPLv3+ licensed. That may seem like an odd choice for a library. However, doing so ensures that users of this code must make their application open source, even if run as a service (such as in a Discord bot). If you want to use this to make proprietary software, look somewhere else.
trans-unit.target: 这个库是AGPLv3+授权的。对于一个库来说,这似乎是一个奇怪的选择。然而,这样做可以确保该代码的用户必须将他们的应用程序开源,即使是作为服务运行(例如在Discord机器人中)。如果你想用它来制作专有软件,请找其他地方。

trans-unit.source: This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU Affero General Public License for more details.
trans-unit.target: 本程序发布的目的是希望它是有用的,但没有任何保证,甚至没有默示的适销性或适合特定用途的保证。更多细节请参见GNU Affero通用公共许可证。

trans-unit.source: This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
trans-unit.target: 本程序是自由软件:你可以在自由软件基金会发布的GNU Affero通用公共许可证的条款下重新发布它和/或修改它,或者是许可证的第3版,或者(由你选择)任何更新的版本。

trans-unit.source: You can find the actual Rust library as nitros12/like-aho-corasick-but-different.
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到实际的Rust库为nitros12 / like-aho-corasick-but-different。

trans-unit.source: You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License along with this program. If not, see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/.
trans-unit.target: 您应该已经与该程序一起收到了GNU Affero通用公共许可证的副本。如果没有，请参阅https://www.gnu.org/licenses/。

trans-unit.source: lacbd is a Python library written in Rust that implements the Aho Corasick algorithm for fast subsentence matching of many keywords against one string.
trans-unit.target: lacbd是一个用Rust编写的Python库,它实现了Aho Corasick算法,用于许多关键字与一个字符串的快速子句匹配。
